text: ineziyami yamenuti sewochi (metageli yalebati) «sura atiweridimi noro’alini?» yilalu፡፡ yet’enekerechimi sura beteweredechina bewisit’wami megadeli betewesa gize ineziyani belibochachewi wisit’i (yenifik’ina) beshita yalebachewini sewochi kemoti yehone mekera berisu layi inide wedek’ebeti sewi asiteyayeti wedanite simeleketu tayachewalehi፡፡ le’inesumi weyolachewi፡፡
